home.subtitle: Senior Frontend Engineer
home.description: I translate business requirements into well-thought-out UX/UI concepts and implement them with a modern stack. From requirements analysis to branding to deployment – everything from a single source.
home.personQuote: Good frontend doesn't start with code, but with understanding the business. I analyze requirements, translate them into UX/UI concepts that match the brand, and plan the project from idea to deployment. My goal:
home.servicesDesc: From requirements engineering to UX/UI design to deployment with Next.js, Supabase, and Vercel.

services.title: OFFER.
services.subtitle: End-to-End Engineering
services.heroDescAfter: , translating into UX/UI, thinking about branding, and implementing with a modern stack like Next.js, Supabase, and Vercel – all the way to deployment.
valueItems: UX/UI Design as Part of Brand Identity

serviceDetail.interestedDesc: Let's have a no-obligation conversation about how I can strengthen your product team.

requirements-engineering.title: Requirements Engineering
requirements-engineering.subtitle: Understanding Business
requirements-engineering.description: Good frontend doesn't start with code, but with understanding the business. I capture stakeholder requirements, analyze business processes, and translate them into clearly defined, actionable specifications.
problems: Unclear or contradictory requirements from stakeholders
Features are built but don't solve the actual problem
Missing documentation leads to scope creep
Communication gaps between business and development

process.title: Stakeholder Interviews
process.desc: Structured conversations to capture business goals.

process.title: Requirements Analysis
process.desc: User stories, acceptance criteria, and prioritization.

process.title: Feasibility Check
process.desc: Technical assessment and effort estimation.

process.title: Specification
process.desc: Documented requirements as a foundation for design and development.

ux-ui-branding.title: UX/UI & Branding
ux-ui-branding.subtitle: Design as Brand Message
ux-ui-branding.description: UX/UI design is more than pretty screens – it's an integral part of brand identity. I translate business requirements into visual concepts that match the brand and convince users.
problems: Inconsistent brand perception across digital touchpoints
Design without understanding underlying business goals
Disconnect between brand identity and user interface
Missing design systems for scalable products

process.title: Brand Analysis
process.desc: Understanding brand identity and translating it into design principles.

process.title: UX Conception
process.desc: Wireframes and user flows based on requirements.

process.title: UI Design
process.desc: High-fidelity designs in Figma, consistent with the brand.

process.title: Design System
process.desc: Scalable component library as single source of truth.

frontend-development.title: Frontend Development
frontend-development.subtitle: Modern Stack
frontend-development.description: Technical implementation with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. I build performant, SEO-friendly, and maintainable frontends – based on previously developed requirements and UX/UI concepts.
problems: Outdated technologies and lack of scalability
Performance issues due to large bundles
No clear architecture for growing projects
Insufficient test coverage and code quality

process.title: Architecture Setup
process.desc: Next.js App Router, component structure, and best practices.

process.title: Component Development
process.desc: Atomic design pattern with TypeScript and Tailwind.

process.title: Supabase Integration
process.desc: Backend connection with Supabase for auth, DB, and storage.

process.title: Testing & QA
process.desc: Automated tests with Jest, Playwright, and CI/CD.

project-delivery.title: Project Planning & Delivery
project-delivery.subtitle: Start to Deployment
project-delivery.description: I plan and accompany projects holistically – from the first idea through development to go-live. With clear structure, realistic milestones, and modern deployment strategies.
problems: Projects without a clear plan are constantly delayed
No defined process from requirements to deployment
Missing CI/CD pipeline for automated releases
No monitoring after launch

process.title: Project Planning
process.desc: Scope, milestones, and tech stack decisions.

process.title: Sprint Structure
process.desc: Iterative development with clear deliverables.

process.title: CI/CD Setup
process.desc: GitHub Actions, automated tests, and preview deployments.

process.title: Go-Live & Monitoring
process.desc: Vercel deployment, performance monitoring, and iteration.

modern-stack.title: Modern Stack
modern-stack.subtitle: Supabase, Vercel & AI
modern-stack.description: I rely on a modern, proven stack: Next.js as framework, Supabase as backend, Vercel as platform, and Claude AI as a productivity tool. All connected through CI/CD pipelines.
problems: Outdated infrastructure with high maintenance costs
No automated deployment and testing
Missing backend solution for rapid prototypes
Manual, repetitive development work without AI support

process.title: Stack Assessment
process.desc: Evaluation of current tools and migration options.

process.title: Supabase Setup
process.desc: Auth, database, storage, and realtime features.

process.title: Vercel Deployment
process.desc: Preview deployments, edge functions, and analytics.

process.title: AI Integration
process.desc: Claude AI for code reviews, testing, and documentation.

dashboard.title: CRM Dashboard Interface
dashboard.desc: Interactive hyper-growth startup CRM with animated KPIs, sales pipeline, workflow automation, and revenue analytics. Modern dashboard design with custom charts (CSS/SVG only) and micro-interactions.

planner.title: Project Planning Tool
planner.desc: Enterprise-grade project planning tool with phase-flow visualization, Kanban board, Gantt timeline, and team workload management. From research phase to launch – everything at a glance.

supabaseAdmin.title: Supabase Admin Tool
supabaseAdmin.desc: Integrated database admin tool directly in the development environment. Schema management, data browser, REST API builder, and auth management – without leaving the workspace.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Workflow Automation
enterprise.desc: Full project ownership: requirements analysis with stakeholders, UX/UI conception in Figma, frontend development, and deployment. Business requirements directly translated into scalable solutions.

saas.title: SaaS Platform & Brand Identity
saas.desc: Holistic project planning: business requirements captured, UX/UI design developed as part of brand identity, frontend implemented with Next.js, and deployed via CI/CD pipelines.

about.title: PROFILE.
about.subtitle: Velimir Müller
about.bio1After: with many years of experience in product engineering. My focus is on the entire product process – from requirements analysis to deployment.
about.bio2: I see requirements engineering as the foundation of every successful project: capturing business requirements, translating them into UX/UI concepts, and treating branding as an integral part of the process.
about.bio3: I plan and accompany projects holistically – from idea to go-live – with a modern stack like Next.js, Supabase, Vercel, and CI/CD pipelines. I use Claude AI as a productivity tool in my daily development work.

exp1.title: Senior Software Engineer - Frontend
exp1.desc: End-to-end product development with React and Vue.js. Feature Ownership & Product Discovery. UX design in Figma, AWS infrastructure (S3, CloudFront), testing with Vitest and Playwright.

exp2.title: Software Engineer - Frontend
exp2.desc: Product ownership for core features. Vue 2/3 architecture, interactive maps with OpenLayers, state management with VueX/Pinia, unit and component tests with Jest/Vitest, mentoring.

exp3.title: Web Developer
exp3.desc: Creation and maintenance of WordPress instances with WooCommerce webshops – from planning to deployment.

exp4.title: Specialist
exp4.desc: Specialist at Zalando SE in the e-commerce division.

privacy.title: PRIVACY.
privacy.subtitle: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1Text: Controller within the meaning of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
privacy.s2Text:
The protection of your personal data is important to me. Personal data is only processed on this website to the extent necessary and in accordance with the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.
privacy.s3Text: When you contact me via the contact form, the information you provide will be processed and stored.
privacy.s3PurposeText: Handling your inquiry and contacting you.
privacy.s3LegalText: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (pre-contractual measures), as the inquiry is related to my professional activity.
privacy.s4Text: The data submitted via the contact form is stored in a database provided by Supabase.
privacy.s4Detail: Supabase is used as a data processor. A data processing agreement exists in accordance with Art. 28 GDPR. Data transfer to a third country is based on EU Standard Contractual Clauses in accordance with Art. 46 GDPR.
privacy.s5Text: The data submitted via the contact form will only be stored for as long as is necessary to process the inquiry or as long as statutory retention obligations exist. After that, the data will be deleted.
privacy.s6Text: You have the right at any time to:
s6Rights: Access your stored personal data (Art. 15 GDPR)
privacy.s6Contact: To exercise your rights, an informal notification by email is sufficient.
privacy.s7Text: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority. The responsible authority is usually the data protection authority of your federal state.
privacy.s8Text: For security reasons, this website uses SSL or TLS encryption to protect transmitted data.
